About Me

Before I found my passion for product design, I spent most of my 20s as a classroom teacher. But I realized, life's too short to stay in my comfort zone.

My transition was unconventional, as the rigorous job market led me on a self-discovery journey. I also noticed that being in [Your Location] hindered many of my opportunities. But that journey led me to where I am today.

My life's mission is to leave an impact through strategic solutions and advocate for diversity, accessibility, and sustainability. ðŸŒ¿

Connect with me on LinkedIn!
); }; export default About;
